attributes.contentHtml:
Hello All,

How does using free domain illegal? Do you have any evidence we abuse Azure?

Best Regards,
AllSafe

attributes.title: VietHosting | Viet Hosting | Viet Host abusing replit | copied lush website

attributes.contentHtml: AllSafe my friend you want proof right? RIGHT? then I want ya to send us a ss of u actually buying nodes but not ABUSING
AllSafe and its not illegal,it just doesn't make sense that Those owners/etc can pay 100 or 200$ per month for nodes but not 10$ for xyz domain

AllSafe I am going to repeat this: I have provided evidence which you deemed invalid without anything to back up with.
About free domain we just replied to you telling that the evidence provided by shershah is not adequate, telling that its just freenom idshield. We have said multiple time using a free domain is very unprofessional, you can find many resources on the internet telling why.
If the owner cared about his seo or his hosts rep he would buy a domain and use a cheaper provider for his "free" host.

AllSafe Also you seem to lack common sense and this isnt a court or something this is a fourm dedicated to make people aware of sketchy hosts.
Also you were accusing us of defamation, please provide proof that the stated "facts" are indeed false.
